title: *FREE LAUNDRY FOR YOU!* Great Neighborhood 1 Bedroom Apartment
posting_body: Will be professionally cleaned and ready for you to move right in.
*FREE LAUNDRY on site for tenant- there is no need to even go outside to use the free laundry facilities.
Perfect location in this beautiful house, in a wonderful neighborhood.
Sunny (with a skylight too), affordable 1 bedroom apartment located in Reading, Massachusetts.
Comes with 1 off-street exclusive parking spot for your car.
Alternatively, walk to commuter rail, town center, and YMCA.
Additional small area in back available for gardening if you wish.
FREE LAUNDRY on site for tenant- no need to even go outside to use the free laundry facilities.
Get more for your money, easily commute to Boston and beat the Boston rents, have your very own parking space, plus free laundry.
Please e-mail to arrange personal showing.
